name: Smart Currency Converter
author: Nokta

sections.description:
Enter the amount and see the conversion!

  • Add Smart Currency Converter Widget on your site
  • Choose from 70+ currencies
  • Change default currencies from your widget settings
  • Fast, simple and accurate!
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Download the zip file and extract the contents,
  2. Upload the folder smart-currency-converter to your WP plugin folder /wp-content/plugins/ directory,
  3. Go to Plugins > Plugins, and activate the plugin,
  4. Go to Appearance > Widgets, and drag the widget to a sidebar,
  5. Set default currencies (the default settings is USD to EUR) and set the Title
  6. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
Can I change the default currencies?

Yes you can change it from the Appearance > Widget > Smart Currency Converter

Which source do you use for the exchange rates?

This is an official plugin developed by the Currency-Rates.com.

Email

Email any problems or suggestions to widgets at currency-rates.com

short_description: Smart Currency Converter widget enables you to convert between 70+ currencies with the latest exchange rates.
